homepage.heroDescription: Easy – Effective – Quality. Dedicated and professional accompanying your business development.
homepage.dedicationDesc: With dedication and professionalism, GOLDEN ACCOUNTING always accompanies the development of your business in every business activity, from basic legal procedures to complex financial strategies.
homepage.trustDesc: As an asset value throughout the business process, we commit to information security, compliance with laws and ensuring accuracy and transparency in all services provided.
homepage.qualityDesc: Quality is our honor. GOLDEN ACCOUNTING continuously improves processes and enhances professional knowledge to bring the perfect service to customers.

benefits.costOptimization: Optimize business costs: Minimize personnel costs and operate cumbersome accounting systems.
benefits.security: Absolute security: Commitment to financial data security with ISO standard storage processes.
benefits.support247: 24/7 support: Expert team ready to answer all legal and tax issues.
benefits.accuracy: Accurate & timely: Accurate financial reports, submitted on schedule according to law.

homepage.comprehensiveSolution: Comprehensive business solutions: Establishment, Accounting, Tax, Website Design and Legal Consulting

serviceDescriptions.businessRegistration: Complete package of documents and procedures for new business registration, changing business registration content (increasing capital, changing business type, changing address/company name, adding/withdrawing business lines).
serviceDescriptions.taxAccounting: Support strategic tax planning, review and advise on applying preferential policies, minimize violation risks, and represent clients when working with tax authorities.
serviceDescriptions.websiteDesign: Analyze requirements, business objectives, and target users to provide the optimal website structure and functionality.

valueDescriptions.dedication: With dedicated and professional spirit, we always accompany our clients, striving to create sustainable value for every task.
valueDescriptions.trust: Always fulfill responsibilities properly, ensure work quality and quickly resolve arising issues.
valueDescriptions.quality: Quality is our honor, implementing work requirements correctly and adhering to all agreed terms, bringing satisfaction to customers.

introStoryItems.standard: Maintaining standards and ensuring accuracy amid the complexity of accounting books
introStoryItems.responsibility: Working with customers to spread social responsibility, contributing to bringing more smiles to Vietnamese children
introStoryItems.culture: Creating culture in startup, building sincere and loyal relationships

uniqueFeatureItems.top1: Top 1 consulting unit with the strongest core expertise

services.introText: We provide flexible service packages to suit different startup business scales and needs, ensuring reasonable costs and high effectiveness.
